function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Critique of the biodiversity-buffers-disease paradigm","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Non-linear relationship between biodiversity and dilution effect","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Adding non-competent and competent host species in city environments","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Increase in biodiversity may lead to proliferation of pest and harmful organisms in urban environments.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Disease-protective effects of biodiversity may not effectively reduce the transmission of foreign or exotic foods may be blamed for disease transmission, leading to social risk.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Biased risk perceptions of covid-19, with individuals perceiving their
